name: HARD PLATFORMER ULTIMATE
description:
HARD PLATFORMER ULTIMATE is an modification to the original HARD PLATFORMER made by Azapru. It was made using the official source code that just released.

NEW FEATURES

Let's list off some new features I added into the mod.

BETTER MENUS

This mod completely remakes the menus used by the original game adding backgrounds and more features.

ONLINE FIXES!

We also remade some code from the Online servers so the connection is more fluent.

FULL CONTROLLER SUPPORT

The use of controllers is now remade in this mod. You can enjoy without touching your keyboard now.

SAVING ISSUES FIXED!

The original had countless saving issues. We fixed it here too!

The game is completely free to play. Please consider supporting the game by donating: https://paypal.me/RedShadowTM
